extendedInfo.description: This is the demo version of the Chart Staff - Staff ModuleWorkers can see what they have to do, who is in charge, and the planning to follow.You can access this module with the credentials:Login: test@temporary.comPassword: temporary66Please refer to http://chartstaff.com for details and documentation.Chart Staff is much more than what we show here, and we can adapt it to your needs. Please contact us for more details. Thank you for your interest, and we hope to meet you soon :)Note: This Android Application is for testing only. The DataBase is automatically reinitialized every 20 minutes. You will may not be the only one to test it at the same time. Thus, the content can move unexpectedly sometimes, but it will give you a good overview of the whole application and its possibilities.
